desc: Graphene Investments offers a wide variety of carbonaceous nanomaterials including: Graphene on Cu foil ,Graphene oxide dispersion, Graphene oxide powder and Reduced graphene oxide powder. The company is dedicated to the production of high-quality graphene-based engineering nanomaterials.

layout.text: We use different synthesis techniques such as CVD or liquid phase exfoliation, offering a wide variety of carbonaceous nanomaterials in powder, dispersions, and films.
